spells.name: Foresight
spells.description:
The target gains +Y Def and +X Off, where X and Y depend on the Game Turn number when the spell was cast.

  • Game Turn 1-2: +0 Def and +4 Off
  • Game Turn 3-4: +2 Def and +2 Off
  • Game Turn 5-6: +4 Def and +0 Off
No model or unit can be affected by more than one instance of this spell simultaneously.

spells.name: Fate's Judgement
spells.description: The target suffers D6+X hits, where X is the Game Turn number when the spell was cast. These hits are set to wound on 4+ and are resolved with AP 0 and Magical Attacks.

spells.name: The Stars Align
spells.description: Target unit must reroll failed to-hit rolls.

spells.name: Chance of Redemption
spells.description:
The target may immediately perform a 5" Magical Move.
In addition, it gains Divine Attacks (Melee).

spells.name: Inescapable Doom
spells.description:
Immediately when the spell is cast, and at the start of each of the caster's subsequent Magic Phases, the target suffers 1 hit that wounds automatically with AP 10 and Magical Attacks.

No model or unit can be affected by more than one instance of this spell simultaneously.

spells.name: Augury of Dispair
spells.description: The target suffers -3 Off, -3 Agi (to a minimum of 1), and treats all Terrain Features as Dangerous Terrain, including Open Terrain.

spells.name: Fountain of Youth
spells.description:
Raise 1 HP in the target's Health Pool.

No model can Raise more than 1 HP per turn from this spell.

spells.name: Entwining Roots
spells.description:
Range: can be cast 6" from Forest.

The target suffers -2" Cha and -2" Mob, both to a minimum of 2".

In addition the target suffers ‚àí2 Agi to a minimum of 1.

spells.name: Veil of Mist
spells.description:
Range: You can measure the distance either from the Caster or from a chosen Water Terrain.

The target gains Hard Target (1) and Magic Resistance (2).

spells.name: Nature's Venom
spells.description:
Range: can be cast 6" from Field.

The target suffers 3D3 hits with Str 3, AP 1, and Magical Attacks. Against units with Light Troops these hits are instead resolved with Str 4 and AP 2.

spells.name: Stone Skin
spells.description: The target gains +1 Res, and Melee Attacks allocated towards it never wound on better than 4+.

spells.name: Earth's Blessing
spells.description: Place a round Forest, Field or Water Terrain feature (declare which when casting the spell) with a 6" diameter on the target. This Terrain Feature has Dangerous Terrain. If the chosen Terrain Feature has already been created by the caster using this spell, first remove the Terrain Feature from the Battlefield before placing it again on the target.

spells.name: Whispers of the Veil
spells.description:
The target suffers -1 Res.

No model or unit can be affected by more than one instance of this spell simultaneously.

spells.name: Touch of the Reaper
spells.description:
The target suffers D3+1 hits with Str 9, AP 10, and Magical Attacks.
When rolling to wound with this attack, substitute the target's Res with its Cou.

spells.name: Danse Macabre
spells.description:
The target may immediately perform a 4" Magical Move.
In addition, it gains Dying Blow, Ghost Step.

spells.name: Chorus of the Damned
spells.description: The target gains Distracting (1), Horror.

spells.name: Spectral Blades
spells.description: Standard Melee Attacks from Rank-and-File models in the target have their Str always set to 4, AP always set to 4, and gain Magical Attacks.

spells.name: Soul Blight
spells.description:
The target takes a Courage Test:
  • If passed it suffers D6 hits.
  • If failed it suffers 2D6 hits.
Hits are with Str 9, AP 10, and Magical Attacks.
When rolling to wound with this attack, substitute the target's Res with its Cou.

spells.description: The target suffers a hit with Area Attack (2√ó2), Str 5, AP 2, and Magical Attacks.

spells.name: Hand of Glory
spells.description:
The target gains Aegis (6+) and Aegis (+1, max. 3+).

The Sacrifice may be performed for this spell.

spells.name: Blood Curse
spells.description:
The target suffers -1 Str and -1 AP.

The Sacrifice may be performed for this spell.

spells.name: Pentagram of Pain
spells.description:
The target suffers 3 hits, with Str 5, AP 2, and Magical Attacks. If one ore more unsaved wounds are caused with this spell, the Caster of the spell Recovers 1 HP.

The Sacrifice may be performed for this spell.

spells.name: The Grave Calls
spells.description:
The target suffers 8 hits, with Str 5, AP 2, and Magical Attacks.

The Sacrifice may be performed for this spell.

spells.name: Umbral Majesty
spells.description:
The target gains Dying Blow, and a single model part in the target gains Grind Attack (4, Str 5, AP 2, Magical Attacks).
Wherever possible, enemy models must allocate their Melee Attacks towards a Health Pool that is not the target.

spells.description: Standard Melee Attacks from Rank-and-File models in the target hit automatically, have their Str always set to 4, AP always set to 0, and gain Flaming Attacks,Magical Attacks.

spells.name: Cage of Embers
spells.description: Immediately when the spell is cast, and whenever the target moves, it suffers 2D3 hits with Str 4, AP 0, Flaming Attacks, Magical Attacks . Afterwards, it gains Weakness (Flaming Attacks).

spells.name: Predator's Instinct
spells.description:
The target gains +2" Cha and Resistance (Ranged Attacks).

spells.name: Awaken the Beast

spells.name: Wild Shape
spells.description: The target's Height is increased by +1, to a maximum of 5, and it gains +1 Res and Stomp Attack (1). If it already had Stomp Attack, the number of hits caused by its Stomp Attack is increased by +1. In models with multiple model parts, only a single model part, chosen by the caster, is affected.

spells.name: Smite the Unbeliever
spells.description:
The target suffers D6 hits with Str 5, AP 2, and Magical Attacks.

✠ : These hits are instead resolved with Str 7.

× : These hits are instead resolved with Str 3.

spells.name: Light of Faith
spells.description:
The target immediately suffers 2D6 hits with Str 2, AP 0, Magical Attacks, and Divine Attacks.

✠ : The target gains Minimise Flee rolls.

× : The target gains Maximised Flee rolls.

spells.name: Weight of Judgement
spells.description:
The target suffers ‚àí10 Agi, to a minimum of 1.

✠ : Enemy* units in the same combat‚Ä† as the target suffer ‚àí10 Agi, to a minimum of 1.

× : Friendly* units in the same combat‚Ä† as the target suffer ‚àí10 Agi, to a minimum of 1.
*From the perspective of the Caster.
‚Ä†At the time of casting the spell.

spells.name: Holy Affliction

The target suffers -1 to wound.

× : The target gains +1 AP.

spells.name: Rain of Fire
spells.description:
The target suffers D3+1 hits, and all units within 3‚Ä≥ of the target suffer 1 hit. These hits are resolved with Str 9, AP 4, Flaming Attacks and Magical Attacks.

✠ : Increase the number of hits each unit suffers from this Spell by 1.

×: Decrease the number of hits each unit suffers from this Spell by 1

spells.name: Wrath of God
spells.description:
Place a marker on the target point. Instead of rolling for Divine Intervention when the spell is cast, do it at the start of each subsequent Magic Phase.

✠ : Each unit within 2D6" from the center of the marker suffers 2D6 with Str 5, AP 2, and Magical Attacks. Then remove the marker.

× : The opponent may move the marker in any direction up to 3".

spells.name: Evil Eye
spells.description:
The target suffers -1 Cou and loses Devastating Charge and/or First Strike (if it has them). If the target rolls for the number of Impact Hits, this roll is Minimised.

No model or unit can be affected by more than one instance of this spell simultaneously.

spells.name: Soured Luck
spells.description: Melee Attacks against the target are set to hit on 2+.

spells.name: Illusory Paths
spells.description:
Choose which effect to apply when casting the spell:

  • The target gains Random Movement (3D6").

The target must perform a move in the movement phase if able to.

spells.name: Cauldron's Curse
spells.description: The target gains Weakness (Ranged Attacks).

spells.name: Mists of Invisibility

spells.name: Death is Only The Beginning
spells.description:
Choose one of the following effects when resolving the spell*.
  • The Rank-and-File part of the target Raises HP equal to its Rsr.
  • An Attachable Model in the target Recovers HP equal to its Rsr.
Height 4‚Äì5 models with Exclusive, and Attachable Models, cannot Recover more than 2 HP from this spell in each Magic Phase.

spells.name: Curse of the Phantom Queen
spells.description: Attacks made by the target suffer ‚àí1 AP, and attacks made against the target gain +1 AP. Attacks from spells are not affected.

spells.name: Favour of Meladys
spells.description:
The player gains 2 Protection Tokens which are removed when the Spell ends. When a friendly unit within 18‚Ä≥ of the Caster suffers a wound, before any Special Saves are taken, you may discard a Protection Token and ignore the wound applying the following rules:
  • Rank-and-File models of Height 1 ignore up to 2 wounds per token, provided they are suffered simultaneously.
  • Characters, and models of Height 4 or 5, can each only ignore a single wound per Phase.
  • Wounds from attacks with Multiple Wounds are not ignored, they inflict one less wound instead.

spells.name: Curse of Nezibkesh
spells.description: The target gains one Incendiary Marker that is not removed when the spell ends. The target suffers ‚àí1 Def and ‚àí1 Off for every Incendiary Marker on it, up to a maximum of ‚àí3.

The marker is considered Covering Terrain for units inside and/or behind them that contributes to ‚ü®Soft‚ü© {Hard} Cover. The Tornado Marker is Dangerous Terrain (‚ü®2‚ü© {3}), even for models with Strider
